title: Hanging Lamp, "Porca Miseria", 2000
medium: Glazed molded porcelain adhered to metal, stainless steel; halogen light source
provenance: 2000: commisioned by Peter Norton directly from the designer, Ingo Maurer; 2010: acquired by Museum
description: Hanging lamp composed of shards of broken white porcelain dishes, cups, saucers, serving pieces, and stainless steel cutlery, mounted on a metal frame work radiating from a central light source; the overall effect evoking an explosion of tableware.

tombstone.epitaph: Hanging Lamp, "Porca Miseria", 2000. Glazed molded porcelain adhered to metal, stainless steel; halogen light source. Gift of Peter Norton. 2010-16-1.
